tasks.label: Clean, Build and Run
tasks.command: rm -rf build .flatpak && flatpak-spawn --host flatpak run org.flatpak.Builder --user --install --force-clean build org.quasars.memories.json && flatpak-spawn --host flatpak run org.quasars.memories

tasks.label: Build and Run
tasks.command: flatpak-spawn --host flatpak run org.flatpak.Builder --user --install --force-clean build org.quasars.memories.json && flatpak-spawn --host flatpak run org.quasars.memories
